elements.name: better_prepared_unit7csp
elements.title: I feel prepared to teach Unit 7 (I feel prepared to teach concepts such as parameters, arguments and libraries).

elements.name: better_prepared_unit5csd
elements.title: I feel prepared to teach Unit 5 after attending this workshop.

elements.name: opportunities_discuss_peers_m5
elements.title: I had opportunities to discuss teaching strategies with peers during this module.

elements.name: find_resources_m5
elements.title: I know where to find resources to help me teach the units we have covered.

elements.name: barriers_m5
elements.title: I have identified the barriers keeping students from feeling included in CS education at my school.

elements.name: strategies_ensure_inclusion_m5
elements.title: This workshop provided me with new ideas and strategies to ensure that my classroom is inclusive.

elements.name: plan_develop_m5
elements.title: I am committed to implementing a plan to differentiate teaching to create an inclusive classroom environment during unit 7.

elements.name: plan_measure_m5
elements.title: I feel ready to track the progress of my inclusion plan: I know how and what to measure as outcomes and supports.

elements.name: learning_in_context_m5
elements.title: After attending this workshop I feel prepared to incorporate strategies to promote learning in context in my CS classroom.

elements.name: min_stereotype_m5
elements.title: As a result of this workshop, I want to implement strategies to minimize stereotype threats in my classroom (e.g. present role models from diverse groups, promote a growth mindset about intelligence, support studentsâ€™ sense of belonging, create fair tests, convey high standards and assure students of their ability to meet them).

elements.name: differentiation_m5
elements.title: After attending this workshop I understand how to apply differentiation strategies when teaching Unit 5.

elements.name: data_analysis_m5
elements.title: Through this workshop, I feel ready to guide students in the use of the Problem Solving Process for Data to draw conclusions about data.
